Architecture: amd64 arm64 armel ia64 m68k mips64el mipsel ppc64el riscv64 loong64 all
Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), quilt, chrpath, libboost-dev, libboost-test-dev, libdune-common-dev, bc, zlib1g-dev, libtool, pkgconf, libdune-grid-dev, libtinyxml-dev, libdune-istl-dev, doxygen, texlive-latex-extra, texlive-latex-recommended, ghostscript, libsuitesparse-dev, libpython3-dev, libopm-common-dev (>= 2025.10~), libscotchmetis-dev, libscotchparmetis-dev, libdune-geometry-dev, libtrilinos-zoltan-dev, mpi-default-dev, mpi-default-bin
Package-List: libopm-grid deb libs optional arch=amd64,arm64,armel,ia64,m68k,mips64el,mipsel,ppc64el,riscv64,loong64 libopm-grid-bin deb libs optional arch=amd64,arm64,armel,ia64,m68k,mips64el,mipsel,ppc64el,riscv64,loong64 libopm-grid-dev deb libdevel optional arch=amd64,arm64,armel,ia64,m68k,mips64el,mipsel,ppc64el,riscv64,loong64 libopm-grid-doc deb doc optional arch=all
